effect.en: Search your deck for up to 2 Grass Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
effect.fr: Cherchez dans votre deck jusqu'à 2 Pokémon Grass, montrez-les, puis ajoutez-les à votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre deck.
effect.es: Busca en tu baraja hasta 2 Pokémon Grass, enséñalos y ponlos en tu mano. Después, baraja las cartas de tu baraja.
effect.it: Cerca nel tuo mazzo fino a due Pokémon Grass, mostrali e aggiungili alle carte che hai in mano. Poi rimischia le carte del tuo mazzo.
effect.pt: Procure por até 2 Pokémon Grass no seu baralho, revele-os e coloque-os na sua mão. Em seguida, embaralhe o seu baralho.
effect.de: Durchsuche dein Deck nach bis zu 2 Grass-Pokémon, zeige sie deinem Gegner und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische anschließend dein Deck.

description.en: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.
